content.query:
use testdb;

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'synapsefs_synapsestoragecontainer_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [synapsefs_synapsestoragecontainer_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://synapsefs@synapsestoragecontainer.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

--drop external table dbo.employee;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.EMPLOYEE (
	[_c0] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c1] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c2] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c3] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c4] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c5] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c6] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c7] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c8] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c9] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c10] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c11] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c12] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c13] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c14] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c15] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c16] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c17] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c18] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c19] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c20] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c21] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c22] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c23] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c24] nvarchar(4000),
	[_c25] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'synapsefs/synapse/workspaces/mysynapsewsaug27/warehouse/employee_data/part-00000-1e44fb12-67df-4325-8cb2-ff27dda31d66-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapsefs_synapsestoragecontainer_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

select * from dbo.EMPLOYEE
